messages.subject: Holt quote?
messages.msgSnippet: there is no true teaching, only learning. I have searched and not found who originally made this statement, though I ve read it many times. ?? In my search,
messages.messageBody:
"there is no true teaching, only learning."

I have searched and not found who originally made this statement,
though I've read it many times. ??
In my search, I came across some cool stuff:

http://sandradodd.com/holt/quotes (you never know what you'll find at
Sandra's site!! These are some AWESOME Holt quotes and make a very
strong case for RU)

I haven't looked around at this blog, but the entry I found was really
great:
http://urlgreyhot.com/personal/weblog/john_holt_quote_on_thoughtful_parenting

This is the Holt quote from the blog and I think it's a REALLY
important one for all unschoolers:
"If I had to make a general rule for living and working with
children, it might be this: be wary of saying or doing anything to a
child that you would not do to another adult, whose good opinion and
affection you valued."

Ren
learninginfreedom.com
